subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: In their Western Conference semifinal opener, the Detroit Red Wings pulled out a 3-2 victory over the Anaheim Ducks when Nicklas Lidstrom scored with 49.1 seconds left.
snippet: In their Western Conference semifinal opener, the Detroit Red Wings pulled out a 3-2 victory over the Anaheim Ducks when Nicklas Lidstrom scored with 49.1 seconds left.
